message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please don't hesitate to share your thoughts.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me is $1,000,000 to you.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is significantly higher than your initial offer reflects. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. I believe this price point better reflects its true worth.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit far from $1,300,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me is $1,000,000 to you.
